T02D3197:203b-1: badzra t'a ra s'a dha nam /
T02D3197:203b-3: rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3197:203b-4: rdo rje sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3197:203b-5: de nas sbyin sreg las mchog gis //
T02D3197:203b-6: 'dod don kun grub de yi phyir //
T02D3197:203b-7: rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs ni //
T02D3197:204a-1: gis yang dag rab tu bshad //
T02D3197:204a-2: de la sngags kyi tshig ni 'di dag rnams yin te /
T02D3197:204a-3: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
T02D3197:204a-4: dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan
T02D3197:204a-5: ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag la phyag 'tshal lo
T02D3197:204a-7: aom t'a re tu tta re tu re bdag gis
T02D3197:204a-8: dbang bgyis pa'i ma rungs pa dang rab tu rungs
T02D3197:204a-9: pa thams cad rmugs par mdzod cig / rengs par
T02D3197:204a-10: mdzod cig / rmongs par mdzod cig //
T02D3197:204a-11: chings shig h'um h'um h'um phat phat phat ma rungs pa thams cad sgrol ma la sv'a h'a /
T02D3197:204a-12: ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par //
T02D3197:204a-13: lha mo sgrol ma rnam bsgoms te //
T02D3197:204a-14: zhal bzhi ma la phyag brgyad ma //
T02D3197:204a-15: rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan ma //
T02D3197:204a-16: gser gyi sku mdog skal ldan ma //
T02D3197:204a-17: gzhon nu mtshan rnams mchog tu 'bar //
T02D3197:204a-18: sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can //
T02D3197:204a-19: rdo rje nyi ma dbang bskur bzhugs //
T02D3197:204a-20: lang tsho bdo zhing mdangs bzang can //
T02D3197:204a-21: gser gyi rna gdub rnam par g-yo //
T02D3197:204a-22: sna tshogs pa yi gdan bzhugs shing //
T02D3197:204a-23: 'od zer dmar pos rnam par brgyan //
T02D3197:204a-24: rdo rje zhags pa de bzhin du //
T02D3197:204a-25: mda' g-yon gsal dang g-yas pa rnams //
T02D3197:204a-26: rdo rje lcags kyu autpala gzhu //
T02D3197:204a-27: sdigs mdzub mdzad rnams g-yon pa rnams //
T02D3197:204a-28: rdo rje skyil krung sbyor ba yis //
T02D3197:204a-29: sa gsum sgrub par byed pa yin //
T02D3197:204a-30: shar du ma tog sgrol ma ste //
T02D3197:204a-31: yi ge aom yig las grub pa'i //
T02D3197:204a-32: kha dog dkar mo yid 'ong ma //
T02D3197:204a-33: zhal gcig ma la phyag gnyis ma //
T02D3197:204a-34: me tog phreng bas phyag brel zhing //
T02D3197:204a-35: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D3197:204a-36: lho na bdug spros sgrol ma ni //
T02D3197:204a-37: kha dog nag mo gzugs bzang ma //
T02D3197:204a-38: phyag na bdug pa'i snod bsnams shing /
T02D3197:204a-39: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D3197:204a-40: nub kyi mar me'i sgrol ma ni //
T02D3197:204a-41: mar me'i kong bu lag thogs shing //
T02D3197:204a-42: ser mo rgyan chen gyis brgyan ma //
T02D3197:204a-43: gser gyi rna gdub gyo ba'o //
T02D3197:204a-44: byang gi dri yi sgrol ma ni //
T02D3197:204a-45: phyag na dri yi dung bsnams pa'i //
T02D3197:204a-46: lha mo sku mdog dmar gyur pa //
T02D3197:204a-47: dkyil 'khor lte par bsgom par bya //
T02D3197:204a-48: lcags kyu ma sogs rab dbye bas //
T02D3197:204a-49: de nas sgo srung bsgom par bya //
T02D3197:204a-50: shar gyi sgo ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma ste /
T02D3197:204a-52: lcags kyu dang autpala phyag na bsnams shing /
T02D3197:204b-0: @204b zhal rnam par bsgyur ba mdog nag mo /
T02D3197:204b-1: lho'i sgor ni rdo rje zhags pa ma ste /
T02D3197:204b-2: mdog ser mo bzhin rnam par bsgyur ba /
T02D3197:204b-3: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma phyag na rdo rje'i zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D3197:204b-4: nub kyi rdo rje lcags thag ma ste /
T02D3197:204b-5: dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma /
T02D3197:204b-6: zhal rnam par bsgyur ba phyag na rdo rje'i lcags thag pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D3197:204b-7: byang gi sgo na ni rdo rje dril bu ma kha dog dkar mo ste /
T02D3197:204b-8: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma bzhin rnam par bsgyur ba rdo rje dril bu phyag na bsnams pa'o //
T02D3197:204b-9: de dag rnams ni nyi ma'i gdan la g-yon bskum pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs shing /
T02D3197:204b-12: sbrul gyis brgyan par bstan par bya ba'o //
T02D3197:204b-13: steng du ni gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba steng
T02D3197:204b-14: 'og tu yang sumbha rnam par bsgom par bya ba
T02D3197:204b-15: ni / 'khor lo dang klu'i zhags pa dang ldan par bsgoms la /
T02D3197:204b-16: sngags spros pas bzlas par bya ba ni /
T02D3197:204b-17: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02D3197:204b-18: pha rol phyin bcu la brten pa //
T02D3197:204b-19: yi ge bcu las lha bcu ni //
T02D3197:204b-20: sbyor ba yis ni bsgom byas na //
T02D3197:204b-21: don rnams thams cad rab tu 'grub //
T02D3197:204b-22: sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa'i //
T02D3197:204b-23: sngags kyi gtso bo mchog de dag / brjod pas grub byed rno gyur pa //
T02D3197:204b-24: rdo rje gur las gsungs pa yin //
T02D3197:204b-25: sngags 'dis stod g-yogs kyi grva la lan bdun mngon par bsngags te /
T02D3197:204b-26: mdud pa bcings nas ri 'bigs byed la 'gro bar
T02D3197:204b-27: gyur na yang 'ga' zhig gis kyang gnod par mi
T02D3197:204b-36: ba men la sogs pa rnams kyang ming drang pa tsam gyis 'joms shing thul bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3197:204b-37: sngags 'dis ji srid du autpala brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin srig bya ste /
T02D3197:204b-38: aom t'a re tutt'a re che ge mo bdag gi dbang du khug sv'a h'a /
T02D3197:204b-39: sngags 'di khva ta'i gshog sgrol lan sum cu rtsa
T02D3197:204b-40: gnyis kyi bar du yongs su bsngags la dgra'i sgor
T02D3197:204b-41: sbas te / nyi ma bdun na skrod par 'gyur ro //
T02D3197:204b-42: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re tsa la pra
T02D3197:204b-43: tsa la sh'a ghri g'a mi ni lha sbyin skrod
T02D3197:204b-45: de nas sbyor ba gzhan yang yod do //
T02D3197:204b-46: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re aa mu ka
T02D3197:204b-47: aa bhi dh'a n'a ku m'a r'i ma dzya bi
T02D3197:204b-48: b'a he na ta sya: pi t'a pra yatstsha tu
T02D3197:204b-49: sv'a h'a / myos byed gtum po sa bon dang /
T02D3197:205a-0: @205a * // de bzhin smyon pa nyid dang ni //
T02D3197:205a-1: mya ngan med 'dab me tog kyang //
T02D3197:205a-2: stong phrag lnga ni sbyin sreg bya //
T02D3197:205a-3: sbrang mar bu ram sbyin sreg ni //
T02D3197:205a-4: bu mo sgrub la rab tu bsngags //
T02D3197:205a-5: nyi ma bdun na rnal 'byor pas //
T02D3197:205a-6: rang 'dod bu mo de rnyed do //
T02D3197:205a-7: de nas sbyor pa gzhan yang yod do //
T02D3197:205a-8: aom t'a re tu tt'a re tu re che ge
T02D3197:205a-9: mo rang gi gnas nas mngon par bkug nas bdag
T02D3197:205a-10: gi drung du khrid shog dza: sngags 'dis 'bras bu
T02D3197:205a-11: b'a da r'i kande ka rang byung gi me tog
T02D3197:205a-12: gis byugs la stong phrag lnga sbyin sreg bya ba'o
T02D3197:205a-13: // bya ba 'dis ni mi'i bdag po'i bu mo yang 'gugs par byed pa yin no //
T02D3197:205a-14: de nas sbyor ba gzhan dag yang yod do //
T02D3197:205a-15: ra tsas l'a'i ras la bcom ldan 'das ma zhal
T02D3197:205a-16: gcig phyag gnyis ma lcags kyu dang autpala dang zhags
T02D3197:205a-17: pa phyag na bsnams pa rnam par bris la /
T02D3197:205a-18: de'i mdun du lha rdzas kyi me tog mchog 'di
T02D3197:205a-19: dag bya ba la sogs pas mchod par bya ba'o
T02D3197:205a-20: // de'i phyi nas ni bsgom pa dang ldan pas bzlas pa bya ste /
T02D3197:205a-21: aom t'a re tutt'a re che ge mos bdag 'dod
T02D3197:205a-22: pa'i sva snam ka tha ya h'um phat bya bas
T02D3197:205a-23: stong phrag lnga nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3197:205a-24: zhags pas rked pa nas bcings shing lcags kyus phug
T02D3197:205a-25: nas bzung ba'i bsgrub bya rkang pa'i 'og tu bsgoms
T02D3197:205a-26: la / bran mo'i tshul gyis longs spyod par bya'o //
T02D3197:205a-27: de nas sbyor ba gzhan yang yod pa ni sgrol
T02D3197:205a-28: ma'i gzungs kyis lan bdun du mngon par bsngags la
T02D3197:205a-29: / bdag nyid mig gnyis mnyes te /
T02D3197:205a-30: rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor zhugs par gyur na
T02D3197:205a-31: 'gal bar zhugs shing gus pa med pa yang de
T02D3197:205a-32: nas rgyal po de slob ma bzhin du gus par
T02D3197:205a-33: byed do // rab tu dang bar gyur pa yang legs par gsal bar byed do //
T02D3197:205a-34: mthun pa'i gtam smra bar byed do //
T02D3197:205a-35: g-yog po nyid du yang yong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3197:205a-36: gtum po yin yang dbang du 'gyur ba 'di ni
T02D3197:205a-37: mthong bas yid ches pa dang nges par bden pa
T02D3197:205a-38: yin no // yang de nas sbyor ba gzhan du gyur pa ni /
T02D3197:205a-39: sgrol ma'i gzugs lan brgya bzlas shing sbrul dug can ro gnyis pa thal bar byas te ;
T02D3197:205a-40: ba kha dog dmar mo'i mar dang shing nyi ma'i
T02D3197:205a-41: shing bal gyis sdong bu byas la legs par spar
T02D3197:205a-42: bas mig rtsi dbab par bya ba'o //
T02D3197:205a-43: mig rtsi de dang rdo rje nyi ma dang rdo
T02D3197:205a-44: rje chos gnyis dang legs par mnyes te rta mchog
T02D3197:205a-46: thal ba dang lhan cig tu mig la phyugs par
T02D3197:205b-0: gyur pa'i mig rdo rje gang @205b la bltas pa
T02D3197:205b-1: de gang gi tshe padma gar gyi dbang phyug yin
T02D3197:205b-2: yang 'dzag par ma gyur na de'i tshe nga sgrol
T02D3197:205b-3: ma ma yin zhing ngas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
T02D3197:205b-4: rnams kyi sku bcom par yang 'gyur ro //
T02D3197:205b-5: de nas sbyor ba gzhan yang yod pa ni bu
T02D3197:205b-6: chung so med pa'i lce blangs la sgrol ma'i gzungs
T02D3197:205b-7: kyis lan bdun mngon par bsngags te /
T02D3197:205b-8: bhring+ga r'a ja'i rtsa ba dang gi wam dang lhan
T02D3197:205b-9: cig gcig tu byas la dpral bar thig le byugs
T02D3197:205b-10: pa gang dang gang gis mthong ba de dbang du
T02D3197:205b-11: byed do // gzhan ya dga' bar mi 'gyur zhing gzhan du 'gro bar yang mi byed de /
T02D3197:205b-13: de nas ni sbyor ba gzhan dag kyang yod de /
T02D3197:205b-14: gsus pa'i 'bu la sgrol ma'i gzungs kyis lan bdun
T02D3197:205b-15: mngon par bsngags nas rdo rje chos dang lhan cig
T02D3197:205b-16: tu byas te / t'ambu la dang bu mo la
T02D3197:205b-17: sbyin na zos pa tsam gyis rnal 'byor dang ldan
T02D3197:205b-18: pa ni mi phyed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3197:205b-19: gzhan la dga' bar mi byed cing gzhan du 'gro par yang mi 'gyur ro //
T02D3197:205b-20: rang gi khyim thabs kyang spong par 'gyur ro //
T02D3197:205b-21: de nas sbyor pa gzhan yang yod pa ni mar
T02D3197:205b-22: nag chen pos bdag nyid kyi lus la byugs la
T02D3197:205b-23: / bsgom pa dang ldan pas sgrol ma'i gzugs khri bzlas par bya ba'o //
T02D3197:205b-24: bzlas pa dang 'bras sh'a li phye mar byas pa'i lde gus dri ma dril phyis byas pa /
T02D3197:205b-25: gang la byin pa de nyi ma lngar yang mi phyed pa yin no //
T02D3197:205b-26: de nas sbyor ba gzhan yang yod pa ni zla
T02D3197:205b-27: ba gzas bzung ba'i dus su sgrol ma'i gzungs bzlas
T02D3197:205b-28: pa dang / sngon du 'gro ba yang byas pas
T02D3197:205b-29: de lta bur gyur pa'i 'jig rten dbang phyug blangs
T02D3197:205b-30: la dung 'de gu dang bcas pa bag ma la
T02D3197:205b-32: nyi ma lngar yang rjes su byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3197:205b-33: de nas sbyor pa gzhan dag kyang yod de /
T02D3197:205b-34: gang la sgrol ma'i gzungs kyi sngags kyis myos pa'i
T02D3197:205b-35: 'bras bu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bsngags
T02D3197:205b-36: shing 'bras bu rta mgrin lhan cig tu byas pa
T02D3197:205b-37: gang la byugs pa dang de dbang du 'gyur ro
T02D3197:205b-38: // de nas sbyor pa gzhan yang yod pa ni //
T02D3197:205b-39: aom t'a re tu tt'a re tu re che ge mo'i 'ching ba grol /
T02D3197:205b-41: sngags 'di shing nyi ma'i yal ga la bsgrub bya'i
T02D3197:205b-42: ming bar bcug pa legs par bris la ku l'i
T02D3197:205b-43: ra gar ta la bzhag nas bcings pa las grol
T02D3197:205b-44: par 'gyur ro // rdo rje sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
T02D3197:205b-45: pandi ta chen po aa bha y'a ka ra'i zhal
T02D3197:206a-0: snga nas dge slong tshul khrims rgyal mtshan @206a *
